doc.after: Belgrade hosts many annual international cultural events, including the Film Festival, Theatre Festival, Summer Festival, Music Festival, Book Fair, and the Beer Fest.[116] The Nobel Prize winning author Ivo AndriÄ wrote his most famous work, The Bridge on the Drina, in Belgrade.[117] Other prominent Belgrade authors include Branislav NuÅ¡iÄ, MiloÅ¡ Crnjanski, Borislav PekiÄ, Milorad PaviÄ and MeÅ¡a SelimoviÄ.[118][119][120] Internationally Belgrade prominent artist: Marina AbramoviÄ and Milovan Destil MarkoviÄ.
